Do You Need A Part Time Casual Experienced Website Designer In Adelaide

22 Sep 2005

Are you based in Adelaide (Australia) and need a part-time/casual website designer?

I have freelance web design experience and currently work as a Media Developer for a software company.

The role I enjoy most is creating backend ecommerce solutions that interacts with the customer.
